com.ngeen.component

Class ComponentBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ngeen.component.ComponentBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComponentCamera, ComponentMaterial, ComponentMesh, ComponentPoint, ComponentRigid, ComponentScript, ComponentSprite, ComponentUIBase, ComponentVariable

    public abstract class ComponentBase
extends java.lang.Object
    The base for all Components. Has to be implemented.
    Author:
    Dragos
